plot outline: Gopi is a village kid playing mischief all around with his friends their main target is a village old man living in a hut once the old man saves him from drowning and Gopi feels sorry for ill treating him and both start to bond well.Gopi finds out the old man is Kisu a poor villager who was in love with Sudha a rich village girl 32 years ago.Sudha's family found about their relation and got her married to a rich person from another village, while Kisu was away to make a gold Bangle (Kaakan) for Sudha which she had lost.Kisu then gives up on his life for living without Sudha.While Sudha devotes her life to help the needy.Gopi after knowing the story decides to the city in search of Sudha.While everyone is worried for him in village as he has gone missing.
title: Kaakan
plot: Simple Lovestory of kisu who is poor and sudha who belongs to rich family which comes to an end after long period.

Gopi is a village kid playing mischief all around with his friends their main target is a village old man living in a hut once the old man saves him from drowning and Gopi feels sorry for ill treating him and both start to bond well.Gopi finds out the old man is Kisu a poor villager who was in love with Sudha a rich village girl 32 years ago.Sudha's family found about their relation and got her married to a rich person from another village, while Kisu was away to make a gold Bangle (_Kaakan_ (qv)) for Sudha which she had lost.Kisu then gives up on his life for living without Sudha.While Sudha devotes her life to help the needy.Gopi after knowing the story decides to the city in search of Sudha.While everyone is worried for him in village as he has gone missing.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
